message: Hello, I'd like to order 3 chicken alfredos and 1 pepperoni pizza

Great! I found the items you're looking for on our menu. Chicken Alfredo is priced at AED 35.0 each, and Pepperoni is priced at AED 43.0. So the total for your order would be AED 148.00. Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel. If you confirm, I can guide you through the ordering process.

Great! To place your order, please provide me with your 8-digit NYU ID and a valid building number from this list: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C. Also, please provide your phone number for contact purposes. Once you've provided this information, I will complete the order for you.

NYU ID: 999301
Building Number: B1
Phone Number: 971501234567

Thank you for your order! You have ordered 3 Chicken Alfredo and 1 Pepperoni pizza. Your total comes to AED 148.00. I have noted down your NYU ID (999301), building number (B1), and phone number (971501234567). Now, I will proceed with your order. Please wait for our confirmation message or notification regarding the pickup time. Thank you for choosing NYU Abu Dhabi dining services. Enjoy your meal!
